txt.en: You were among the first to defeat Gorgar the Ruthless at Amdân Dammul, the Bloody Threshold.
It is at Amdân Dammul, the Bloody Threshold, that Durin Stonehelmson will seek to end the War of Three Peaks by challenging Gorgar the Ruthless himself.
Amdân Dammul, the Bloody Threshold - The Vanguard
It is at Amdân Dammul, the Bloody Threshold, that Durin Stonehelmson will seek to end the War of Three Peaks by challenging Gorgar the Ruthless himself.
Be among the first to fully complete 'Amdân Dammul, the Bloody Threshold' on Tier 3.
